org.jclouds.joyent.sdc.v6_5

Interface SDCAsyncClient


  • public interface SDCAsyncClient
    Provides asynchronous access to SDC via their REST API.

    Author:
    Adrian Cole
    See Also:
    SDCClient, api doc
